thread.title: Genevieve

author: Genevieve
title: Genevieve
text: Our daughter set up the initial car hire for us and gave us all the details on paper and all went smoothly to that point. The only slight hitch was when we went to the Budget desk at the airport. The girl couldn't immediately find our booking so I gave her the paperwork I had and she found the details in a few keystrokes on her computer, and then picked up a set of keys and handed them to us, asking at the same time if we would prefer an up-grade to a 4 WD vehicle. As we drive those all the time we took the little swift and it was great to drive.
